sites/all/modules/contrib/mollom/mollom.pages.inc File Reference


Functions

 mollom_captcha_js ($type, $session_id)

Detailed Description

Various non-administration page callbacks for the mollom module.

Function Documentation

mollom_captcha_js ( $  type,
$  session_id 
)

AJAX callback to retrieve a CAPTCHA.

Parameters:
$type The new CAPTCHA type to retrieve, e.g. 'image' or 'audio'.
$session_id The last known Mollom session id contained in the form.
Returns:
A JSON array containing:
  • content: The HTML markup for the new CAPTCHA.
  • session_id: The Mollom session id for the new CAPTCHA.
Todo:
Add error handling.

mollom_report_form ( &$  form_state,
$  entity,
$  id 
)

Form builder for report to Mollom form.

Parameters:
$entity The entity type of the data to report, e.g. 'node' or 'comment'.
$id The entity id the data belongs to. If 'session' is passed as $entity, then $id is assumed to be a Mollom session_id, as returned by Mollom servers, which should only be used to report session data that was not stored for an entity in the database (such as contact form submissions).

mollom_report_form_submit ( $  form,
&$  form_state 
)

Form submit handler for mollom_report_form().
